data.message: Yo Em....I'm a hip hop artist from Hawaii...I can't message you...so here's my comment. Love you bro...but now it's time for 22 days of push ups...22 a day....for Veterans who are fighting sucidal tendacies. Man em out bro. Aloha!! In a rap version...." The rap game is yours...soldiers on tour but war is real. Just like rap. But before you go and before you feel, the enormous power of assortable sheids, you gotta know the real. Yeah I said real twice, and that's what's up. Even though it sucks, gives us 22 push ups, for 22 days and all that's left is...good luck";) Love ya Em.
